name: analyze_elements_tool
description: Specialized tool for extracting and identifying structural elements from document images. ONLY use for: document structure analysis, layout element identification, page component extraction, structural markup analysis, and document element classification. NOT for: content analysis, text extraction, metadata extraction, diagrams, or tables. If no structural elements are found, returns that no document elements were detected and suggests checking with user for appropriate tool selection.

image_path.description: S3 URL (s3://bucket/key) or absolute file path to the image. Use this OR image_data, not both.

image_data.description: Base64-encoded image data. Use this OR image_path, not both. Preferred when image is already in memory.

aws_profile.description: Optional AWS profile name for Bedrock authentication. If not provided, uses default AWS credentials
